src:
Ajax Amsterdam, Tamu yang Nakal di Liga Champions
06 Nov 2019, 09:25 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Ajax Amsterdam memang gagal menang saat berjumpa Chelsea. Akan tetapi, hasil imbang 4-4 sudah cukup untuk menegaskan reputasi Ajax. Tim asal Belanda adalah tamu yang nakal di Liga Champions.
Laga Chelsea vs Ajax digelar di Stamford Bridge, Rabu (6/11/2019) dini hari WIB. Laga matchday keempat fase grup Liga Champions 2019/2020 berjalan dengan sangat seru. Delapan gol terjadi sepanjang laga.
Chelsea sempat tertinggal 1-3 pada babak pertama. Dua dari tiga gol Ajax berasal dari bunuh diri Tammy Abraham dan Kepa Ariezabalaga. Sedangkan, Chelsea mencetak gol dari penalti Jorginho.
Ajax sempat unggul 1-4 setelah Donny van de Beek mencetak gol di menit ke-55. Namun, kartu merah Daley Blind dan Jan Veltman di menit 68 dan 69 membuat Ajax kendur. Chelsea menyamakan skor menjadi 4-4.
text:
Ajax Amsterdam, Naughty Guest in the Champions League
Nov 6, 2019, 09:25 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Ajax Amsterdam did fail to win when they met Chelsea. However, a 4-4 draw is enough to confirm Ajax's reputation. The Dutch team are naughty guests in the Champions League.
Chelsea vs Ajax match was held at Stamford Bridge on Wednesday (11/06/2019) early morning hrs. The matchday of the fourth phase of the 2019/2020 Champions League group stage went very exciting. Eight goals occur throughout the match.
Chelsea had left behind 1-3 in the first round. Two of Ajax's three goals came from Tammy Abraham and Kepa Ariezabalaga's suicide. Meanwhile, Chelsea scored from Jorginho's penalty.
Ajax had a 1-4 lead after Donny van de Beek scored in the 55th minute. However, Daley Blind and Jan Veltman's red cards in minutes 68 and 69 made Ajax loose. Chelsea evened the score to 4-4.
